title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 64.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 64.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply to Deep Pond
located on the John J. Schiff Scout Reservation, property of the Theodore

Roosevelt Council of the Boy Scouts of America in Wading River, New York. This

Part shall apply to Deep Pond and lands necessary to access the pond as
described in the Deep Pond Access Agreement signed on March 17, 1997. This
access agreement is part of a land purchase agreement signed on the same
date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
64.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
